alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bennington County through 530 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Manchester, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arlington, Manchester, Dorset, Manchester Center, Sunderland, North Rupert, Beartown, East Rupert, North Dorset, Manchester Depot, Richville, Barnumville, Freedleyville, Sunderland Station, South Dorset and East Dorset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
